sentences.en: According to a report in the newspaper, he still has control over the remaining shares.
sentences.cn: 根据报纸上的报道，他依然控制着剩余的股份。

sentences.en: According to recent news reports , two of the victims are Americans.
sentences.cn: 根据近期的新闻报道，受害者中有两名是美国人。

sentences.en: every movement I made was reported back to him.
sentences.cn: 我的一举一动都报告给他。

sentences.en: Government officials have denied reports of rebel advances.
sentences.cn: 政府官员否认了有关叛军正在推进的传言。

sentences.en: He wrote up his visit in a report of over 600 pages.
sentences.cn: 他将自己的访问整理成了一份600多页的报告。

sentences.en: I gather his report is highly critical of the trial judge.
sentences.cn: 据我所知，他在报道中毫不留情地批评了初审法官。

sentences.en: I was so thrilled to get a good report from him.
sentences.cn: 收到他的好消息让我欣喜若狂。

sentences.en: I'll report back the moment I have located him.
sentences.cn: 我一找到他就马上汇报。

sentences.en: I’ve asked him to come back next week and report on his progress.
sentences.cn: 我要求他下星期回来汇报工作进展情况。

sentences.en: If I get this report finished I'll knock off early.
sentences.cn: 如果我写完这篇报告，我就会早点下班。

sentences.en: Many areas in the country'sinterior are unable to report Aids cases immediately.
sentences.cn: 该国内地的很多地区无法即时报告艾滋病病例。

sentences.en: Politicians want a lap-dog press which will uncritically report their propaganda.
sentences.cn: 政客们想要的是不问是非、甘为他们搞宣传的哈巴狗一样的新闻媒体。

sentences.en: She resolved to report the matter to the hospital's nursing manager.
sentences.cn: 她决定把这件事汇报给医院的护士长。

sentences.en: The committee reported the new tax bill out.
sentences.cn: 委员会呈了交新的纳税议案

sentences.en: the deadpan voice of a police officer reporting back to his superior.
sentences.cn: 向上司述职的警官毫无感情色彩的声音。

sentences.en: The incident was widely reported in the national press.
sentences.cn: 这一事件在全国的媒体上被广泛报道。

sentences.en: The report had not been received with undiluted enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 这份报告并未收到热烈的反响。

sentences.en: The report outlined possible uses for the new weapon.
sentences.cn: 该报告概述了这种新式武器的可能用途。

sentences.en: The report shows that fewer couples are getting hitched.
sentences.cn: 报告显示，结婚的人数呈下降趋势。

sentences.en: The report suggested that the same trend was at work in politics.
sentences.cn: 这份报告表明，同一趋势也在影响着政治。

sentences.en: This is Gavin Williams, reporting from the United Nations in New York.
sentences.cn: 我是加文·威廉斯，在纽约联合国总部为您报道。

sentences.en: This week, the company mailed out its annual report.
sentences.cn: 本周该公司群发了其年度报告。

sentences.en: Today's report is rather more discouraging for the economy.
sentences.cn: 今天的报道让人对经济更加丧失了信心。

sentences.en: We aim to report the news as fairly as possible.
sentences.cn: 我们力求公正地报道这一新闻。

sentences.en: With a report on these developments, here's Jim Fish in Belgrade.
sentences.cn: 这里是吉姆·菲什在贝尔格莱德发来的关于事件进展的报道。

words.tran_cn: 报告文学，报道文学；报道，新闻报道

phrases.tran_cn: 年报，年度报告；年度决算；年度财务报告
(美)（议会委员会）将法案交还给议会表决
呈交，提出报告：在审议后交回立法机关以作出决定
天气预报，天气报告；气象报告

trans.tran_en: a written or spoken description of a situation or event, giving people the information they need
a written or spoken description of a situation or event, giving people the information they need
a written or spoken description of a situation or event, giving people the information they need

trans.tran_cn: 报告，报道/到，宣布，传闻，举报
trans.tran_en: to give people information about recent events, especially in newspapers and on television and radio

trans.tran_cn: 报到； 报告， 汇报； 报道； 隶属， 对负责
trans.tran_en: to give people information about recent events, especially in newspapers and on television and radio
to give people information about recent events, especially in newspapers and on television and radio
to give people information about recent events, especially in newspapers and on television and radio
